id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><a id="_Toc394922668" name="_Toc394922668"><!--Anchor--></a><a 
id="_Toc395634129" name="_Toc395634129"><!--Anchor--></a>ARTICLE II</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Loan; Proceeds; 
Note; Security Interest</u></font>.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922669" 
name="_Toc394922669"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634130" 
name="_Toc395634130"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 2.01</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Term Loan</u></font>. Subject to the terms and 
conditions of this Agreement and in reliance upon the representations and 
warranties of the Borrower set forth herein and in the other Loan Documents, 
each Lender agrees, severally and not jointly, to loan to the Borrower such 
Lender&#8217;s Commitment Amount, in an aggregate amount equal to the principal 
amount of Four Million Five Hundred Forty Five Thousand Four Hundred Fifty Four 
Dollars ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>4,545,454</u></font>) (the &#8220;<font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold"><u>Term Loan</u></font>&#8221;), reflecting an original issue 
discount of twelve percent (12%)(discount calculation = 4,000,000/0.88). For the
avoidance of doubt, the maximum aggregate amount to be funded by the Lenders to 
the Borrower for the Term Loan on the Effective Date shall be Four Million 
Dollars ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>4,000,000</u></font>) (the &#8220;<font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold"><u>Funded Amount</u></font>&#8221;) and the Borrower shall repay 
the full principal amount of the Term Loan (being ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><u>4,545,454</u></font>) to the Lenders in Dollars on the Maturity Date or
earlier repayment date.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922670" 
name="_Toc394922670"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634131" 
name="_Toc395634131"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 2.02</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Additional Loan</u></font>. Subject to the 
terms and conditions of this Agreement and in reliance upon the representations 
and warranties of the Borrower set forth herein and in the other Loan Documents,
the Borrower shall have the one time option exercisable any time up to the one 
year anniversary of the Effective Date to borrow from the Lenders up to an 
additional One Million Dollars ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>1,000,000</u></font>) (such
additional loan, the &#8220;<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Additional 
Loan</u></font>&#8221;, and the principal amount funded/borrowed for the 
Additional Loan, the &#8220;<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Additional Funded 
Amount</u></font>&#8221;), <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>provided</u></font>&#160;<font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold"><u>that</u></font>: (i) the Borrower is not in Default and (ii) 
the Borrower has satisfied the requirements of Section 7.02 in full. Subject to 
the foregoing conditions, each Lender agrees, severally and not jointly, to loan
to Borrower such Lender&#8217;s Commitment Amount of the Additional Funded 
Amount, to be proportionally reduced in the event that the Additional Funded 
Amount is less than One Million Dollars ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><u>1,000,000</u></font>).</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922671" 
name="_Toc394922671"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634132" 
name="_Toc395634132"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 2.03</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Use of Proceeds</u></font>.</font></div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 99pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(a)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE:
6.75pt" id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Term Loan</u></font>. The
proceeds of the Term Loan may be used only for the following 
purposes:</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">i.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Repay existing senior loan made to Borrower by Green 
Bank, N.A. in an amount not to exceed One Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($<font
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold"><u>150,000</u></font>);</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">ii.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">Pay for General and Administrative Costs and other Corporate Purposes in 
an aggregate amount not to exceed One Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars 
($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>1,500,000</u></font>);</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">iii.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</fo
nt><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">pay transaction costs, including Lender fees, broker fees, legal costs, 
and other professional fees with respect to the closing of the transaction 
contemplated by this Agreement;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">iv.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><fo
nt style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">fund 
the costs of resuming, increasing and sustaining oil and gas production, 
including well work and infrastructure improvements, at the Galveston Bay 
Fields.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 103.5pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY:
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(b)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.06pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Additional Loan</u></font>. The 
proceeds of the Additional Loan may be used only to fund the costs of resuming, 
increasing and sustaining oil and gas production, including well work and 
infrastructure improvements, at the Galveston Bay Fields.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">17</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922672" 
name="_Toc394922672"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634133" 
name="_Toc395634133"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 2.04</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Term Note</u></font>. The Term Loan made by each 
Lender shall be evidenced by a separate term loan note of the Borrower for each 
Lender in substantially the form of <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Exhibit</u></font> A as of the 
Effective Date.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922673" 
name="_Toc394922673"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634134" 
name="_Toc395634134"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 2.05</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Additional Note</u></font>. The Additional 
Loan made by each Lender shall be evidenced by a separate term loan note of the
Borrower for each Lender in substantially the form of <font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Exhibit</u></font> B as 
of the effective date of the Additional Loan.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922674" 
name="_Toc394922674"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634135" 
name="_Toc395634135"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 2.06</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Grant of Security Interest.</u></font> To secure the 
repayment of the Loan and the Additional Loan, the Borrower hereby, and pursuant
to the Security Instruments, grants to Agent, on behalf of the Lenders, a first 
priority lien and security interest in the Collateral.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><a id="_Toc394922675" name="_Toc394922675"><!--Anchor--></a><a 
id="_Toc395634136" name="_Toc395634136"><!--Anchor--></a>ARTICLE III</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Repayment of 
Loan</u></font>.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922676" 
name="_Toc394922676"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634137" 
name="_Toc395634137"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 3.01</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Repayment of Loan</u></font>. The full 
outstanding principal amount of the Loans together with any applicable and 
accrued unpaid fees payable hereunder and all other amounts payable under the 
Loan Documents shall be repayable on the Maturity Date, or the date the Loan or 
the Additional Loan is accelerated.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922677" 
name="_Toc394922677"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634138" 
name="_Toc395634138"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 3.02</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Interest</u></font>.</font></div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(a)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE:
5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Term 
Loan</u></font>.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">i.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Term Loan shall not bear interest during the first 
nine (9) months, unless an Event of Default has occurred and is continuing, in 
which case default interest shall be due and payable pursuant to <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 3.02(d).</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">ii.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">During the period commencing on the day after the nine (9) month 
anniversary of the Effective Date, the Term Loan will bear interest at the Term 
Loan Interest Rate, which interest shall be due and payable monthly in arrears, 
in Cash.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(b)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY:
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Additional 
Loan</u></font>. In the event the Borrower exercises its option to borrow the 
Additional Loan pursuant to the terms and conditions set forth in this 
Agreement, the Additional Loan will bear interest at the Additional Loan 
Interest Rate, which shall be due and payable monthly, in arrears, in 
Cash.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(c)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Default</u></font>. 
Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the event of the occurrence of an Event of
Default, the Borrower will pay to the Lenders interest on the Loans at the 
Default Rate, and (to the fullest extent permitted by law) on any fees and other
amounts payable by the Borrower hereunder, under the Tern Note, the Additional 
Note, or under any other Loan Document, for the period commencing on the date of
any Event of Default until the same is paid in full or all Events of Default are
cured or waived (after as well as before judgment).</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(d)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Interest Rate 
Computations</u></font>. All interest computed by reference to the Interest Rate
and the Default Rate shall be computed on the basis of a year of 360 days and 
the actual number of days elapsed. The amount of interest shall be computed by 
the Lenders, and such computation shall be conclusive absent manifest error, and
shall be binding upon the parties hereto.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">18</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922678" 
name="_Toc394922678"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634139" 
name="_Toc395634139"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 3.03</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Prepayments</u></font>.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(a)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Optional 
Prepayment</u></font>. At any time before the Maturity Date, the Borrower shall 
have the right at its option on any date to prepay the Loans in whole or in 
part, subject to the following and subject to the Borrower simultaneously paying
to the Lenders all accrued and unpaid interest and all unpaid fees, costs and 
expenses due hereunder:</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">i.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Whenever the Borrower desires to prepay the Loans, it 
shall provide a prepayment notice to the Agent by 12 p.m., New York, NY time at 
least fifteen (15) Business Days prior to the date on which such prepayment of 
the Loans shall occur, setting forth the total amount of such prepayment, which 
shall be no less than Two Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($<font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><u>250,000</u></font>), or the remaining principal balance of the Loans 
together with any accrued and unpaid fees, costs and expenses.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">ii.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">All optional prepayment notices shall be irrevocable. The principal amount
of the Loans for which a prepayment notice is given, together with interest on 
such principal amount, and all accrued and unpaid fees, costs and expenses, 
shall be due and payable on the date specified in such prepayment notice as the 
date on which the proposed prepayment is to be made.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(b)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Re-borrowing Prohibited; 
Application of Prepayments</u></font>. Any voluntary prepayments on the Loans 
may not be re-borrowed.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><a id="_Toc394922679" name="_Toc394922679"><!--Anchor--></a><a 
id="_Toc395634140" name="_Toc395634140"><!--Anchor--></a>ARTICLE IV</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Payments; 
Fees</u></font>.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922680" 
name="_Toc394922680"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634141" 
name="_Toc395634141"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 4.01</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt"
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Payments</u></font>. The Borrower shall make each 
payment required to be made by it hereunder (whether of principal, interest, 
fees, or of amounts payable under <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'',
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 5.01, <font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section 
</u></font>5.02 or otherwise) prior to 12:00 p.m., New York, NY time, on the 
date when due, in immediately available funds, without defense, deduction, 
recoupment, set-off or counterclaim. Fees, once paid, shall not be refundable 
under any circumstances. Any amounts received after such time on any date may, 
in the discretion of the Agent, be deemed to have been received on the next 
succeeding Business Day for purposes of calculating interest thereon. All such 
payments shall be made by wire transfer or other form of electronic funds 
transfer to the Lenders at their accounts specified in a writing delivered to 
Borrower by the Agent or any Lender, except that payments pursuant to <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 5.01, <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'',
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 5.02 and <font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 13.03 shall be made directly to the Persons entitled
thereto. If any payment hereunder shall be due on a day that is not a Business 
Day, the date for payment shall be extended to the next succeeding Business Day,
and, in the case of any payment accruing interest, interest thereon shall be 
payable for the period of such extension. All payments hereunder shall be made 
in Dollars.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922681" 
name="_Toc394922681"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634142" 
name="_Toc395634142"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 4.02</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Structuring Fee</u></font>. In consideration 
for the structuring of the Loans, the Borrower will pay to the Lenders, in 
proportion to their Commitment Amounts: (i) a structuring fee (the &#8220;<font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold"><u>Structuring Fee</u></font>&#8221;) comprised of a Cash payment 
in an amount equal to two percent (2%) of the principal amount of the Loans. The
Structuring Fee for the Term Loan will be Ninety Thousand Nine Hundred and Nine 
Dollars ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>90,909</u></font>), payable on or prior to the
Effective Date. The Structuring Fee for the Additional Loan will be equal to two
percent (2%) of the Additional Funded Amount, and in no case greater than Twenty
Thousand Dollars ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>20,000</u></font>) payable on the 
effective date of the Additional Loan.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">19</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922682" 
name="_Toc394922682"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634143" 
name="_Toc395634143"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 4.03</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Other Fees</u></font>. Whether or not the 
Transactions hereby shall be consummated, the Borrower agrees to promptly pay 
all reasonable and documented fees, costs and expenses incurred by Lenders in 
connection with any matters contemplated by or arising out of this Agreement or 
the other Loan Documents including the following, and all such reasonable fees, 
costs and expenses shall be part of the Indebtedness, payable on demand and 
secured by the Mortgaged Property: (a) fees, costs and expenses (including 
attorneys&#8217; fees, and fees of environmental consultants, accountants and 
other professionals retained by the Lenders) incurred in connection with the 
examination, review, due diligence investigation, documentation and closing of 
the financing arrangements evidenced by the Loan Documents; (b) fees, costs and 
expenses (including attorneys&#8217; fees, and fees of professionals retained by
the Lenders) incurred in connection with the review, negotiation, preparation, 
documentation, execution and administration of the Loan Documents, the Loans and
any amendments, waivers, consents, forbearance and other modifications relating 
thereto or any subordination or intercreditor agreements; (c) fees, out of 
pocket costs and expenses incurred in creating, perfecting and maintaining 
perfection of Liens in favor of the Agent for the Lenders including title 
insurance premiums, real estate survey costs and mortgage or recording taxes and
fees; (d) fees, out of pocket costs and expenses incurred in connection with 
forwarding to the Borrower the proceeds of the Loans including a Lender&#8217;s 
standard wire transfer fee; (e) fees, costs, expenses (including 
attorneys&#8217; fees) and costs of settlement incurred in collecting upon or 
enforcing rights against the Mortgaged Property or incurred in any action to 
enforce this Agreement or the other Loan Documents or to collect any payments 
due from the Borrower under this Agreement or any other Loan Document or 
incurred in connection with any refinancing or restructuring of the credit 
arrangements provided under this Agreement, whether in the nature of a 
&#8220;workout&#8221; or in connection with any insolvency or bankruptcy 
proceedings or otherwise; and (f) the Agent&#8217;s and the Lenders&#8217; out 
of pocket expenses and disbursements, whenever incurred, in monitoring and 
administering the Loans.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922683" 
name="_Toc394922683"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634144" 
name="_Toc395634144"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 4.04</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Placement Fee</u></font>. ROTH Capital Partners, LLC 
(&#8220;<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Roth</u></font>&#8221;), is entitled to a fee, which
shall not to exceed 5% of the Loans in accordance with the agreement between 
Roth and the Borrower, a copy of which is attached hereto as <font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Exhibit</u></font> I. Gary W. Vick (&#8220;<font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT:
bold"><u>Vick</u></font>&#8221;) is entitled to a fee equal to one percent (1%) 
of the Loans in accordance with the consulting agreement between Vick and the 
Borrower, a copy of which is attached hereto as <font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Exhibit</u></font> 
IA.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><a id="_Toc394922684" name="_Toc394922684"><!--Anchor--></a><a 
id="_Toc395634145" name="_Toc395634145"><!--Anchor--></a>ARTICLE V</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Increased Costs; 
Taxes</u></font>.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922685" 
name="_Toc394922685"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634146" 
name="_Toc395634146"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 5.01</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Increased Costs</u></font>.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(a)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Capital Requirements</u></font>. At any time that a 
Lender is subject to banking regulations, if the Lender determines that any 
Change in Law regarding capital requirements has or would have the effect of 
reducing the rate of return on the Lender&#8217;s capital, if any, as a 
consequence of this Agreement or the Loans made by the Lenders hereunder, to a 
level below that which such Lender could have achieved but for such Change in 
Law (taking into consideration such Lender&#8217;s policies with respect to 
capital adequacy), then from time to time the Borrower will pay to such Lender 
such additional amount or amounts as will compensate such Lender for any such 
reduction in rate of return suffered with respect to the amounts advanced under 
the Loans. If a Lender becomes subject to banking regulations it shall notify 
the Borrower of same within a reasonable period of time.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">20</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt">(b)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Changes in Law</u></font>. At any time that a Lender 
is subject to banking regulations, if any Change in Law shall:</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">i.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">impose, modify or deem applicable any reserve, special 
deposit or similar requirement against assets of, deposits with or for the 
account of, or credit extended by, any Lender; or</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">ii.</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">impose on the Lender or the London interbank market any other condition 
affecting this Agreement or the Loans;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 144pt; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">and the result of any of the foregoing 
shall be to increase the cost to the Lender of making or maintaining the Loans 
(or of maintaining its obligation to make the Additional Loan) or to reduce the 
amount of any sum received or receivable by the Lender (whether of principal, 
interest or otherwise), then the Borrower will pay to the Lender such additional
amount or amounts as will compensate the Lender for such additional costs 
incurred or reduction suffered.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(c)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Certificates</u></font>. A certificate of such Lender
setting forth the amount or amounts necessary to compensate the Lender as 
specified in the immediately preceding subsection (a) shall be delivered to the 
Borrower and shall be conclusive absent manifest error. The Borrower shall pay 
such Lender the amount shown as due on any such certificate within ten (10) 
Business Days after receipt thereof.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(d)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Effect of Failure or Delay in Requesting 
Compensation</u></font>. Failure or delay on the part of a Lender to demand 
compensation pursuant to this <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 5.01 shall not constitute a
waiver of the Lender&#8217;s right to demand such compensation.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922686" 
name="_Toc394922686"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634147" 
name="_Toc395634147"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 5.02</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Taxes</u></font>.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(a)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Payments Free of Taxes</u></font>. Any and all 
payments by or on account of any obligation of the Borrower or any Guarantor 
under any Loan Document shall be made free and clear of and without deduction 
for any Indemnified Taxes or Other Taxes; <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>provided</u></font> that if the 
Borrower or any Guarantor shall be required to deduct any Indemnified Taxes or 
Other Taxes from such payments, then (i) the sum payable shall be increased as 
necessary so that after making all required deductions (including deductions 
applicable to additional sums payable under this <font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section </u></font>5.02),
each Lender receives an amount equal to the sum it would have received had no 
such deductions been made, (ii) the Borrower or such Guarantor shall make such 
deductions and (iii) the Borrower or such Guarantor shall pay the full amount 
deducted to the relevant Governmental Authority in accordance with Applicable 
Law.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(b)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Payment of Other Taxes by the Borrower</u></font>. 
The Borrower shall pay any Other Taxes to the relevant Governmental Authority in
accordance with Applicable Law.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">21</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(c)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Indemnification by the Borrower</u></font>. The 
Borrower shall indemnify each Lender within ten (10) days after written demand 
therefore, for the full amount of any Indemnified Taxes or Other Taxes paid by 
such Lender on or with respect to any payment by or on account of any obligation
of the Borrower hereunder (including Indemnified Taxes or Other Taxes imposed or
asserted on or attributable to amounts payable under this <font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 5.02) and any penalties, interest and expenses 
arising therefrom or with respect thereto, whether or not such Indemnified Taxes
or Other Taxes were correctly or legally imposed or asserted by the relevant 
Governmental Authority; provided, however, that nothing hereunder shall impose 
upon the Borrower an obligation to indemnify the Lenders with respect to any 
Excluded Taxes. A certificate of a Lender as to the amount of such payment or 
liability under this <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 5.02 shall be delivered to the 
Borrower and shall be conclusive absent manifest error.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(d)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Evidence of Payments</u></font>. As soon as 
practicable, but in any event within thirty (30) days after any payment of 
Indemnified Taxes or Other Taxes by the Borrower or a Guarantor to a 
Governmental Authority, the Borrower shall deliver to each affected Lender the 
original or a certified copy of a receipt issued by such Governmental Authority 
evidencing such payment, a copy of the return reporting such payment or other 
evidence of such payment reasonably satisfactory to such Lender.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922687" 
name="_Toc394922687"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634148" 
name="_Toc395634148"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 5.03</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt"
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Illegality</u></font>. Notwithstanding any other 
provision of this Agreement, if it becomes unlawful for a Lender to honor its 
obligation to make or maintain the Loans, then the affected Lender shall 
promptly notify the Borrower thereof and such Lender&#8217;s obligation to make 
or maintain the Loans shall be suspended.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><a id="_Toc394922688" name="_Toc394922688"><!--Anchor--></a><a 
id="_Toc395634149" name="_Toc395634149"><!--Anchor--></a>ARTICLE VI</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Account 
Procedures; Casualty Proceeds</u></font>.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922689" 
name="_Toc394922689"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634150" 
name="_Toc395634150"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 6.01</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Accounts and Control Agreements Account</u></font>. 
All Cash Receipts will be deposited into accounts, each of which shall be 
subject to an Account Control Agreement.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922690" 
name="_Toc394922690"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634151" 
name="_Toc395634151"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 6.02</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Casualty Proceeds</u></font>. All Cash or Cash
Equivalents representing proceeds of insurance policies for the repair, 
rebuilding or restoration of any of the Borrower Group&#8217;s Properties as a 
result of a Casualty Event (the &#8220;<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Casualty 
Proceeds</u></font>&#8221;) (for collateral purposes) are hereby assigned by the
Borrower to the Lenders, and the Agent shall have the right to collect any such 
payments, and such payments collected by the Borrower or Agent shall be 
deposited in an account controlled by the Agent for the Lenders (the 
&#8220;<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Casualty Proceeds Account</u></font>&#8221;). In the
event of any Casualty Event, the Borrower shall deliver within ten (10) Business
Days, a written report from an engineering firm acceptable to the Agent 
describing the nature of the Casualty Event, the nature of any restoration 
required, and a good faith estimate of the cost of such restoration. While an
Event of Default exists, the Agent may apply such Casualty Proceeds to the 
prepayment of the outstanding principal balance and accrued interest of the 
Loans and the other Indebtedness, whether or not such Indebtedness is then due 
and payable. If no Event of Default exists, the proceeds shall be disbursed from
the Casualty Proceeds Account for such restoration in accordance with procedures
reasonably determined by the Agent consistent with construction loan funding 
principles. Notwithstanding the foregoing, if the Borrower determines that the 
Casualty Proceeds shall be used for restoration and such Casualty Proceeds are 
less than One Hundred Thousand Dollars ($<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><u>100,000</u></font>), then such amount shall not be deposited in the 
Casualty Proceeds Account, but shall be made available to the Borrower and the 
Borrower shall utilize such proceeds solely for repair, rebuilding or 
restoration of such Casualty Event.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">22</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><a id="_Toc394922691" name="_Toc394922691"><!--Anchor--></a><a 
id="_Toc395634152" name="_Toc395634152"><!--Anchor--></a>ARTICLE VII</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Conditions 
Precedent</u></font>.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 31.5pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 4.5pt"><a 
id="_Toc394922692" name="_Toc394922692"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634153" 
name="_Toc395634153"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 7.01</font><font
style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Funding of the Term Loan</u></font>. The 
obligation of the Lenders to make the Term Loan shall not become effective until
the date on which each of the following conditions is satisfied (or waived in 
accordance with <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 13.02):</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(a)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Lenders shall have received the Structuring Fee with
respect to the Term Loan and any and all other fees and other amounts due and 
payable on or prior to the Effective Date, including, to the extent invoiced, 
reimbursement or payment of all expenses required to be reimbursed or paid by 
the Borrower in accordance with <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Article</u></font> IV;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(b)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Agent shall have received a secretary&#8217;s 
certificate setting forth (i) approval by the Borrower and with respect to the 
authorization of the members of the Borrower Group to execute and deliver the 
Loan Documents to which any such Person is a party and to enter into the 
transactions contemplated in those documents, (ii) the officers of the Borrower 
Group (y) who are authorized to sign the Loan Documents to which each applicable
Borrower Group member is a party and (z) who will, until replaced by another 
officer or officer duly authorized for that purpose, act as its representative 
for the purposes of signing documents and giving notices and other 
communications in connection with this Agreement and the transactions 
contemplated hereby, (iii) specimen signatures of such authorized officers, and 
(iv) Charter Documents of the Borrower Group member who are parties to the Loan 
Documents, certified as being true and complete. The Agent and the Lenders may 
conclusively rely on such certificate until the Agent receives notice in writing
from the Borrower to the contrary.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(c)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Agent shall have received certificates of the 
appropriate State agencies with respect to the existence, qualification and good
standing of each member of the Borrower Group;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(d)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Agent shall have received from each party hereto 
counterparts (in such number as may be requested by the Agent) of this Agreement
signed on behalf of such party;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(e)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Agent shall have received for each Lender a separate
Term Note dated as of the Effective Date;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(f)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Agent shall have 
received from the Borrower the Common Shares issued in the name of each Lender 
to effect the Stock Grant and the Agent shall have received duly executed 
counterparts of the Stock Grant Agreement as provided in <font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 9.16;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(g)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Agent shall have received from each party thereto 
duly executed counterparts (in such number as may be requested by the Lenders) 
of the Security Instruments, including the Guarantee and Collateral Agreement, 
the Mortgages, the Pledge Agreements and the other Security Instruments 
described on <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt"><u>Exhibit</u></font> D. In connection with the execution and 
delivery of the Security Instruments, the Lenders shall be reasonably satisfied 
that the Security Instruments create first priority, perfected Liens on the 
Collateral, such Liens being subject only to Liens set forth on <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Schedule</u></font> 10.03 and Excepted Liens identified in clauses (a) 
through (e) of the definition thereof, but, in the case of clauses (a) through 
(e), subject to the provisos at the end of such definition; and <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>provided</u></font> that the Liens on the Delayed Collateral shall not 
be required to be perfected prior to advancement of the Term Loan;</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>

until the date on which each of the following conditions is satisfied (or waived
in accordance with <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif;
