<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(m)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">a Change in Control shall occur.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(n)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">With the exception of an oil and gas exploration and 
production joint venture in the Borrower&#8217;s Namibia oil and gas properties 
and interests, and/or a full or partial sale of the Borrower&#8217;s oil and gas
properties or interests in Namibia, a member of the Borrower Group shall sell 
any of the Oil and Gas Properties during the term of this 
Agreement.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922781" 
name="_Toc394922781"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634241" 
name="_Toc395634241"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
11.02</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0; </font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt"><u>Remedies</u></font>.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(a)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In the case of an Event of Default other than one 
described in <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section </u></font>11.01(h), <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 11.01(i) or 
<font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 11.01(j), at any time thereafter during the 
continuance of such Event of Default, the Agent may, by notice to the Borrower, 
declare the Notes and the Loans then outstanding to be due and payable in whole,
and thereupon the principal of the Loans, together with accrued interest 
thereon, and all fees and other obligations of the Borrower and the Guarantors 
accrued hereunder and under the Notes and the other Loan Documents, shall become
due and payable immediately, without presentment, demand, protest, notice of 
intent to accelerate, notice of acceleration or other notice of any kind, all of
which are hereby waived by the Borrower and each Guarantor; and in case of an 
Event of Default described in <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 11.01(h), <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 11.01(i) or <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section</u></font> 11.01(j), the 
Notes and the principal amount of the Loans then outstanding, together with 
accrued interest thereon and all fees and the other obligations of the Borrower 
and the Guarantors accrued hereunder and under the Notes and the other Loan 
Documents, shall automatically become due and payable, without presentment, 
demand, protest or other notice of any kind, all of which are hereby waived by 
the Borrower and each Guarantor.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">59</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(b)</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">All proceeds realized from the liquidation or other 
disposition of collateral or otherwise received after maturity of the Notes, 
whether by acceleration or otherwise, shall be applied: <font style="FONT-STYLE:
italic; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">first</font>, to reimbursement of expenses and indemnities provided for in
this Agreement and the Security Instruments; <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">second</font>, 
to accrued interest on the Notes; <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">third</font>, to fees; <font
style="FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-
SIZE: 10pt">fourth</font>, pro rata to principal outstanding on the Notes, 
Indebtedness referred to in clause (b) of the definition of 
&#8220;Indebtedness&#8221; owing to a Lender or an Affiliate of a Lender; and 
<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">fifth</font>, and any excess shall be paid to the Borrower or 
as otherwise required by any Applicable Law.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922782" 
name="_Toc394922782"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634242" 
name="_Toc395634242"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
11.03</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Disposition of Proceeds</u></font>. The Security Instruments contain an
assignment by the Borrower and/or the Guarantors unto and in favor of the Agent,
on behalf of the Lenders, of all of the Borrower&#8217;s or each 
Guarantor&#8217;s interest in and to production and all proceeds attributable 
thereto which may be produced from or allocated to the Mortgaged Property. The 
Security Instruments further provide in general for the application of such 
proceeds to the satisfaction of the Indebtedness and other obligations described
therein and secured thereby. Notwithstanding the assignment contained in such 
Security Instruments, until the occurrence of an Event of Default, the Agent and
the Lenders agrees that they will neither notify the purchaser or purchasers of 
such production nor take any other action to cause such proceeds to be remitted 
to the Agent or the Lenders, but the Agent and Lenders will instead permit such 
proceeds to be paid to the Borrower or its Subsidiaries.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.6pt"><a id="_Toc394922783" name="_Toc394922783"><!--Anchor--
></a><a id="_Toc395634243" name="_Toc395634243"><!--Anchor--></a>ARTICLE 
XII</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
3.6pt"><u>The Agent</u></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306028" 
name="_Toc391306028"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634244" 
name="_Toc395634244"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.01</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Appointment; Powers</u></font>.&#160; Each of the Lenders hereby 
irrevocably appoints the Agent as its agent and authorizes the Agent to take 
such actions on its behalf and to exercise such powers as are delegated to the 
Agent by the terms hereof and the other Loan Documents, together with such 
actions and powers as are reasonably incidental thereto.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306029" 
name="_Toc391306029"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634245" 
name="_Toc395634245"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.02</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Duties and Obligations of Agent</u></font>.&#160; The Agent 
shall not have any duties or obligations except those expressly set forth in the
Loan Documents.&#160; Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, (a) the 
Agent shall not be subject to any fiduciary or other implied duties, regardless 
of whether a Default has occurred and is continuing, (b) the Agent shall not 
have any duty to take any discretionary action or exercise any discretionary 
powers, except as provided in <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section 12.03</u></font>, and (c) except as 
expressly set forth herein, the Agent shall not have any duty to disclose, and 
shall not be liable for the failure to disclose, any information relating to the
Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries that is communicated to or obtained by the
entity serving as Agent or any of its Affiliates in any capacity.&#160; The 
Agent shall be deemed not to have knowledge of any Default unless and until 
written notice thereof is given to the Agent by the Borrower or a Lender, and 
shall not be responsible for or have any duty to ascertain or inquire into (i) 
any statement, warranty or representation made in or in connection with this 
Agreement or any other Loan Document, (ii) the contents of any certificate, 
report or other document delivered hereunder or under any other Loan Document or
in connection herewith or therewith, (iii) the performance or observance of any 
of the covenants, agreements or other terms or conditions set forth herein or in
any other Loan Document, (iv) the validity, enforceability, effectiveness or 
genuineness of this Agreement, any other Loan Document or any other agreement, 
instrument or document, (v) the satisfaction of any condition set forth in <font
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Article VII</u></font> or elsewhere herein, other than to confirm 
receipt of items expressly required to be delivered to the Agent or as to those 
conditions precedent expressly required to be to the Agent&#8217;s satisfaction,
(vi) the existence, value, perfection or priority of any collateral security or 
the financial or other condition of the Borrower Group or any other obligor or 
guarantor, or (vii) any failure by the Borrower or any other Person (other than 
itself) to perform any of its obligations hereunder or under any other Loan 
Document or the performance or observance of any covenants, agreements or other 
terms or conditions set forth herein or therein.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">60</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306030" 
name="_Toc391306030"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634246" 
name="_Toc395634246"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.03</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Action by Agent</u></font>.&#160; The Agent shall not have any duty to 
take any discretionary action or exercise any discretionary powers, except 
discretionary rights and powers expressly contemplated hereby that the Agent is 
required to exercise in writing as directed by the Lenders and in all cases the 
Agent shall be fully justified in failing or refusing to act hereunder or under 
any other Loan Documents unless it shall (a) receive written instructions from 
the Lenders specifying the action to be taken and (b) be indemnified and 
defended to its satisfaction by the Lenders against any and all liability and 
expenses which may be incurred by it by reason of taking or continuing to take 
any such action.&#160; The instructions as aforesaid and any action taken or 
failure to act pursuant thereto by the Agent shall be binding on all of the 
Lenders.&#160; If a Default has occurred and is continuing, then the Agent shall
take such action with respect to such Default as shall be directed by the 
Lenders in the written instructions (with indemnities) described in this <font 
style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Section 12.03</u></font>, <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>provided</u></font> that, unless and 
until the Agent shall have received such directions, the Agent may (but shall 
not be obligated to) take such action, or refrain from taking such action, with
respect to such Default as it shall deem advisable in the best interests of the 
Lenders.&#160; In no event, however, shall the Agent be required to take any 
action which exposes the Agent to liability or which is contrary to this 
Agreement, the Loan Documents or applicable law.&#160; The Agent shall not be 
liable for any action taken or not taken by it with the consent or at the 
request of the Lenders, and otherwise the Agent shall not be liable for any 
action taken or not taken by it hereunder or under any other Loan Document or 
under any other document or instrument referred to or provided for herein or 
therein or in connection herewith or therewith INCLUDING ITS OWN ORDINARY 
NEGLIGENCE, except for its own gross negligence or willful 
misconduct.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306031" 
name="_Toc391306031"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634247" 
name="_Toc395634247"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.04</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Reliance by Agent</u></font>.&#160; The Agent shall be 
entitled to rely upon, and shall not incur any liability for relying upon, any 
notice, request, certificate, consent, statement, instrument, document or other 
writing believed by it to be genuine and to have been signed or sent by the 
proper Person.&#160; The Agent also may rely upon any statement made to it 
orally or by telephone and believed by it to be made by the proper Person, and 
shall not incur any liability for relying thereon and each of the Borrower and 
the Lenders hereby waives the right to dispute the Agent&#8217;s record of such 
statement, except in the case of gross negligence or willful misconduct by the 
Agent.&#160; The Agent may consult with legal counsel, independent accountants 
and other experts selected by it, and shall not be liable for any action taken 
or not taken by it in accordance with the advice of any such counsel, 
accountants or experts.&#160; The Agent may deem and treat the payee of any Note
as the holder thereof for all purposes hereof unless and until a written notice 
of the assignment or transfer thereof permitted hereunder shall have been filed 
with the Agent.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306032" 
name="_Toc391306032"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634248" 
name="_Toc395634248"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.05</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Subagents</u></font>.&#160; The Agent may perform any and 
all its duties and exercise its rights and powers by or through any one or more 
sub-agents appointed by the Agent.&#160; The Agent and any such sub-agent may 
perform any and all its duties and exercise its rights and powers through their 
respective Related Parties.&#160; The exculpatory provisions of the preceding 
Sections of this <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Article XII</u></font> shall apply to any such 
sub&#173;agent and to the Related Parties of the Agent and any such sub-agent, 
and shall apply to their respective activities in connection with the 
syndication of the credit facilities provided for herein as well as activities 
as Agent.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">61</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306033" 
name="_Toc391306033"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634249" 
name="_Toc395634249"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.06</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Resignation of Agent</u></font>.&#160; Subject to the appointment and 
acceptance of a successor Agent as provided in this <font style="FONT-FAMILY: 
''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section 12.06</u></font>,
the Agent may resign at any time by notifying the Lenders and the 
Borrower.&#160; Upon any such resignation, the Lenders shall have the right, in 
consultation with the Borrower, to appoint a successor.&#160; If no successor 
shall have been so appointed by the Lenders and shall have accepted such 
appointment within 30 days after the retiring Agent gives notice of its 
resignation, then the retiring Agent may, on behalf of the Lenders, appoint a 
successor Agent.&#160; Upon the acceptance of its appointment as the Agent 
hereunder by a successor, such successor shall succeed to and become vested with
all the rights, powers, privileges and duties of the retiring Agent, and the 
retiring Agent shall be discharged from its duties and obligations 
hereunder.&#160; The fees payable by the Borrower to a successor Agent shall be 
the same as those payable to its predecessor unless otherwise agreed between the
Borrower and such successor.&#160; After the Agent&#8217;s resignation 
hereunder, the provisions of this <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'',
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Article XII</u></font> and <font style="FONT-
FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section 
13.03</u></font> shall continue in effect for the benefit of such retiring 
Agent, its sub-agents and their respective Related Parties in respect of any 
actions taken or omitted to be taken by any of them while it was acting as 
Agent.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306034" 
name="_Toc391306034"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634250" 
name="_Toc395634250"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.07</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Agents as Lenders</u></font>.&#160; The party serving as the
Agent hereunder shall have the same rights and powers in its capacity as a 
Lender as any other Lender and may exercise the same as though it were not the 
Agent, and such party and its Affiliates may accept deposits from, lend money to
and generally engage in any kind of business with the Borrower or any Subsidiary
or other Affiliate thereof as if it were not the Agent hereunder.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306035" 
name="_Toc391306035"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634251" 
name="_Toc395634251"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.08</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>No Reliance</u></font>.&#160; Each Lender acknowledges that 
it has, independently and without reliance upon the Agent or any other Lender 
and based on such documents and information as it has deemed appropriate, made 
its own credit analysis and decision to enter into this Agreement and each other
Loan Document to which it is a party.&#160; Each Lender also acknowledges that 
it will, independently and without reliance upon the Agent or any other Lender 
and based on such documents and information as it shall from time to time deem 
appropriate, continue to make its own decisions in taking or not taking action 
under or based upon this Agreement, any other Loan Document, any related 
agreement or any document furnished hereunder or thereunder.&#160; The Agent 
shall not be required to keep itself informed as to the performance or 
observance by the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries of this Agreement, the 
Loan Documents or any other document referred to or provided for herein or to 
inspect the Properties or books of the Borrower or its Subsidiaries.&#160; 
Except for notices, reports and other documents and information expressly 
required to be furnished to the Lenders by the Agent hereunder, neither the 
Agent shall have any duty or responsibility to provide any Lender with any 
credit or other information concerning the affairs, financial condition or 
business of the Borrower (or any of its Affiliates) which may come into the 
possession of such Agent or any of its Affiliates.&#160; In this regard, each 
Lender acknowledges that Gardere Wynne Sewell LLP is acting in this transaction 
as special counsel to the Agent only, except to the extent otherwise expressly 
stated in any legal opinion or any Loan Document.&#160; Each other party hereto 
will consult with its own legal counsel to the extent that it deems necessary in
connection with the Loan Documents and the matters contemplated 
therein.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-TOP: 10pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both" 
id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, Serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 8pt" id="DSPFPageNumberArea">62</div>
<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px" 
id="DSPFPageBreak" noshade="noshade">
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc391306036" 
name="_Toc391306036"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634252" 
name="_Toc395634252"><!--Anchor--></a><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New 
Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
12.09</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><u>Authority of Agent to Release Collateral and Liens</u></font>.&#160; 
Each Lender hereby authorizes the Agent to release any collateral that is 
permitted to be sold or released pursuant to the terms of the Loan 
Documents.&#160; Each Lender hereby authorizes the Agent to execute and deliver 
to the Borrower, at the Borrower&#8217;s sole cost and expense, any and all
releases of Liens, termination statements, assignments or other documents 
reasonably requested by the Borrower in connection with any sale or other 
disposition of Property to the extent such sale or other disposition is 
permitted by the terms of <font style="FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><u>Section 10.13</u></font> or is otherwise authorized 
by the terms of the Loan Documents.</font></div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.6pt"><a id="_Toc395634253" name="_Toc395634253"><!--Anchor--
></a>ARTICLE XIII</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><a id="_Toc394922784" name="_Toc394922784"><!--Anchor--></a>&#160;<a 
id="_Toc395634254" name="_Toc395634254"><!--Anchor--></a></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times 
New Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">ARTICLE XIV</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New Roman'', Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="FONT-VARIANT: small-caps; FONT-FAMILY: ''Times New
Roman'', Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold"><u>Miscellaneous</u></font>.</div>
<div><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><a id="_Toc394922785" 
name="_Toc394922785"><!--Anchor--></a><a id="_Toc395634255"

Roman'', Times, serif; COLOR: #000000; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Section 
14.01</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt" 
id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16

telecopy, as follows:</font></div>

<hr style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: 
#000000; MARGIN: 4px 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-
